channel.title: Microsoft Developer Blogs
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, announcements, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【What does it even mean to Close a Windows Runtime asynchronous operation or action?】关闭 Windows 运行时异步操作或操作是什么意思？
item.description: 【That's the end of the road.】那就是路的尽头。

item.title: 【Microsoft 365 Certification control spotlight: Security awareness training】Microsoft 365 认证控制焦点：安全意识培训
item.description: 【Discover how Microsoft 365 Certification validates compliance for enterprise-ready apps with security awareness training.】了解 Microsoft 365 认证如何通过安全意识培训来验证企业就绪应用的合规性。

item.title: 【Microsoft Dev Box Customization Now Supports Native Run-as-user】Microsoft Dev Box 自定义现在支持本机以用户身份运行
item.description: 【Dev Box customization now supports native run as user in the customization yaml files. The native run-as-user capability is more powerful in terms of reliability, status tracking and error reporting. You can also see the execution progress on run-as-user customization tasks from Dev Portal.】Dev Box 自定义现在支持在自定义 yaml 文件中以用户身份本机运行。本机用户运行功能在可靠性、状态跟踪和错误报告方面更加强大。您还可以从开发门户查看以用户身份运行自定义任务的执行进度。

item.title: 【My Summer Experience as a SWE Intern at Microsoft】我在微软担任 SWE 实习生的暑期经历
item.description: 【Hi everyone! I’m Serena, a rising 4th year at Rochester Institute of Technology with a major in Computer Science and a minor in Psychology. This summer I was a returning intern at Microsoft as a software engineering intern with the JavaScript and TypeScript Tooling team.】大家好！我是 Serena，罗彻斯特理工学院四年级新生，主修计算机科学，辅修心理学。今年夏天，我作为 JavaScript 和 TypeScript 工具团队的软件工程实习生回到了 Microsoft。

item.title: 【Measuring Differentials of Product Images in AI-generated Ads】测量人工智能生成的广告中产品图像的差异
item.description: 【Various methodologies of measuring differentials between a product image and an AI-generated ad for the purpose of product representation integrity in serving AI-generated ads.】测量产品图像和人工智能生成的广告之间差异的各种方法，目的是在提供人工智能生成的广告时确保产品表现的完整性。

item.title: 【Pre-pin Microsoft Teams meeting apps using Teams Admin Center】使用 Teams 管理中心预固定 Microsoft Teams 会议应用程序
item.description: 【We are thrilled to announce that tenant admins can now pin apps to Microsoft Teams meetings organized in their organization.】我们很高兴地宣布，租户管理员现在可以将应用程序固定到在其组织中组织的 Microsoft Teams 会议。

item.title: 【The Silicon Graphics Media and Artificial Intelligence (SiGMA) team is hiring!】硅谷图形媒体和人工智能 (SiGMA) 团队正在招聘！
item.description: 【Do you want to be a part of the Silicon Graphics Media and Artificial Intelligence (SiGMA) platform team? We are hiring for multiple positions in multiple locations – if you’re interested in knowing more about opportunities in SiGMA, please see the below for more details!】您想成为 Silicon Graphics 媒体和人工智能 (SiGMA) 平台团队的一员吗？我们正在多个地点招聘多个职位 - 如果您有兴趣了解更多有关 SiGMA 工作机会的信息，请参阅以下内容了解更多详细信息！

item.title: 【Go 1.22.6-1 and 1.21.13-1 Microsoft builds now available】Go 1.22.6-1 和 1.21.13-1 Microsoft 版本现已推出
item.description: 【A new set of Microsoft Go builds is now available for download.】一组新的 Microsoft Go 版本现已可供下载。

item.title: 【Why do I get E_ACCESS­DENIED when trying to access my brokered Windows Runtime object?COM is double-checking the trust level.】为什么在尝试访问我的代理 Windows 运行时对象时收到 E_ACCESSDENIED？COM 正在仔细检查信任级别。
item.description: 【COM is double-checking the trust level.】COM 正在仔细检查信任级别。

item.title: 【Azure Cosmos DB JavaScript SDK 4.1.0 Preview is Here!】Azure Cosmos DB JavaScript SDK 4.1.0 预览版现已推出！
item.description: 【We are excited to announce the release of the Azure Cosmos DB JavaScript SDK 4.1.0 Preview! This latest update brings several improvements, new features, and bug fixes to enhance developer experience and enable advanced data querying capabilities when working with Azure Cosmos DB.】我们很高兴地宣布发布 Azure Cosmos DB JavaScript SDK 4.1.0 预览版！此最新更新带来了多项改进、新功能和错误修复，以增强开发人员体验并在使用 Azure Cosmos DB 时启用高级数据查询功能。
